title: Event Notifier Message
description: A notification message a subscriber will receive when subscribed to a topic

event_reference.description: The unique reference for this event

object_data.description: The data of the object reference

work_reference_number.description: Reference number unique to a Work

permit_reference_number.description: Reference number unique to a Permit

promoter_swa_code.description: Street Works Act (SWA) code of the organisation carrying out the work

promoter_organisation.description: Name of the organisation carrying out the work

highway_authority.description: Name of the organisation responsible for the area where the work is taking place

works_location_coordinates.description: Location of the work in GeoJSON format using BNG (British National Grid EPSG:27700)

street_name.description: Name of the street where the work is taking place as per NSG (National Street Gazetteer)

area_name.description: Name of the area where the work is taking place as per NSG (National Street Gazetteer)

work_category.description: Category of the work. Categories: Minor, Standard, Major, Major(PAA), Immediate - urgent, Immediate - emergency, HS2 (Highway)

traffic_management_type.description: How traffic will be managed while work is taking place. Types: Road closure, Contra-flow, Lane closure, Multi-way signals, Two-way signals, Convoy workings, Stop/go boards, Priority working, Give and take, Some carriageway incursion, No carriageway incursion

proposed_start_date.description: The date the work is proposed to start

proposed_end_date.description: The date the work is proposed to end

proposed_start_time.description: The time the work is proposed to start. Undefined if not provided by the promoter.

proposed_end_time.description: The time the work is proposed to end. Undefined if not provided by the promoter.

actual_start_date_time.description: The date & time the work started

actual_end_date_time.description: The date & time the work ended

work_status.description: Status of the work. Statuses: Works planned, Works in progress, Works completed, Works cancelled, Unattributable works, Historical works, Non notifiable works, Section 81 works

highway_authority_swa_code.description: Street Works Act (SWA) code of the organisation responsible for the area where the Work is taking place

work_category_ref.description: (API Reference) Category of the work: Category References: minor, standard, major, immedaite_urgent, immediate_emergency, paa, hs2_highway

traffic_management_type_ref.description: (API Reference) How traffic will be managed while work is taking place. Reference Types: road_closure, contra_flow, lane_closure, multi_way_signals, two_way_signals, convoy_workings, stop_go_boards, priority_working, give_and_take, some_carriageway_incursion, no_carriageway_incursion

work_status_ref.description: (API Reference) Status of the work. Status References: planned, in_progress, completed, cancelled, unattributable, historical, non_notifiable, section_81

is_covid_19_response.description: Is the work in response to Covid 19

works_location_type.description: Type of location where the work is taking place. Types: Footway, Carriageway, Verge, Cycleway, Footpath, Parking place, Bus stop or stand, Cycle hire docking station, Taxi rank

event_time.description: The time the event occurred and was submitted in Street Manager

object_reference.description: The reference number of the object
